JOB DESCRIPTION: Technical Requirements: (.NET  Strong concepts of OOPS, ASP.NET, C#, JSON, Linq, SQL (Advanced knowledge would be advantage), Advanced .Net Concepts, WCF, WebApi, Web services)Develop solutions as per requirements and coding standards with minimal errors, adhering to timelines & quality consistently.Ensure participation in database design process.Ensure proper Error Handling and Exception HandlingTechnical Analysis of the given technical and/or functional specifications or a CRUnderstands the business requirement in its entirety and provide correct solutions.Highlights risks or issues.Ensure application availability, response & resolution as per agreed roster, with 0 follow-ups.Effectiveness and validity of defects/comments raisedNo escalations from Business / IS counterparts.Ensure unit test case document and results are updated to user stories/tickets.Use ticketing to facilitate discussion and ask questions to the stakeholders. Behavioral Competencies:Zero UAT or PROD defectsTechnical support and guidance for junior developers and developers.Customer Issues Resolved, customer feedback.Functional & subject matter expert for the application.Understand all the operators in execution plan and its relevance in the current query context along with establishing whether the query cost is optimal.Ensure proactive and consistent communication with internal / external team / stakeholders.Knowledge of tools like Rally/JIRA would be a plus.Knowledge of other technologies like .NET advanced is plus.Candidate having knowledge of AngularJS would be advantageJob Location: Kanjurmarg, Mumbai.Looking for candidates with short notice period.
